titles.title: Tribal Law and Order Act of 2010
Indian Arts and Crafts Amendments Act of 2010
Directing the Clerk of the House of Representatives to correct the enrollment of H.R. 725.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 7/27/2010--Passed Senate without amendment. Directs the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make corrections in the enrollment of H.R. 725 (Tribal Law and Order Act of 2010).
